title: Mobile App Designer
companyName: Application rise imperator Evolving New Technologies...
tagsAndSkills: Quality standards,Concept design,Web technologies,Coding,Competitor analysis,Manager Technology,Mobile applications,Photoshop
jobDescription:
The ideal candidate should have knowledge of the different mobile platforms and the ability to translate code into applications that are user friendly. In addition to excellent problem-solving skills, we are looking for an individual who is highly diligent and who possesses strong creative and technical skills. As the mobile app designer, you should have a deeper comprehension of the art of storytelling in addition to demonstrating a strong web and app design experience.

Areas of focus include content, visual design, controls, user journey flow implementation, information architecture, development, user research, and branding.

The mobile app designer should share links to their portfolio.

Responsibilities
  • Identify and develop new mobile app features
  • Develop APIs that support mobile functionality
  • Recommend and implement new products, applications, and mobile protocols
  • Lead mobile app development projects and provide strategic thinking
  • Lead the complete mobile application lifecycle (concept, design, test, release, and support)
  • Evaluate whether new applications meet the latest quality standards Analysing user activity and feedback, and make the required changes to enhance user experience
  • Conducting competitor analysis
  • Diligent delivery of designs and deployment of apps
  • Be up to date with the latest trends in technology, concepts, terminology, and best practices for mobile applications and coding
Skills and Qualifications
  • Demonstrate experience delivering high quality mobile application designs to customers
  • Excellent design skills with a systematic understanding of colours, intuitive design, typography, and palate development
  • Knowledge of user-experience design for web and mobile
  • Knowledge of the latest technology trends and design skills
  • Advanced skills in software such as UXP, Photoshop, InvisionApp, and other applicable tools
  • A team player who can collaborate with other team members
  • A keen eye for aesthetics

title: Flutter Developer
jobDescription:
Position Overview:
Triad Technology is seeking a passionate and motivated Junior Mobile App Developer to join our team. This is an excellent opportunity for a recent graduate or someone with up to 6months to 1 year of experience to kickstart their career in mobile application development. As a Junior Mobile App Developer, you will work closely with our experienced development team to learn, grow, and contribute to the development of innovative mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms.

Responsibilities:
- Assist in the development of high-quality, user-friendly mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms.
- Collaborate with senior developers to translate requirements and concepts into code.
- Conduct testing and debugging to ensure the functionality and performance of applications.
- Learn and adapt to new technologies, tools, and frameworks.
- Support the development team in various tasks as needed.

Requirements:
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.
- Certification into CMAD, CSM, PSM or into any equivalent course.
- Basic understanding of programming languages such as C++, C, Java, or Flutter.
- Familiarity with mobile application development processes and tools.
- Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.
- Excellent communication and teamwork abilities.
- Eagerness to learn and grow in a fast-paced environment.
- Previous internship or project experience in mobile app development is a plus.
